    public class DataTableSource
extends BaseDataTableSource
implements org.apache.flink.table.connector.source.abilities.SupportsStatisticReport, org.apache.flink.table.connector.source.abilities.SupportsDynamicFiltering
    A BaseDataTableSource implements SupportsStatisticReport and SupportsDynamicFiltering.
